```{r}
g <- play_erdos_renyi(n = 100, p = 0.1, directed = FALSE) %>% 
  as_tbl_graph()
edges <- g %>% activate(edges) %>% as_data_frame
set.seed(13)
visNetwork(nodes = data_frame(id = 1:100, label = 1:100), 
           edges, 
           width = "100%") %>%
  visPhysics(solver ='forceAtlas2Based')
```

```{r}
ggraph(g, layout = 'kk') +
  geom_edge_link() +
  geom_node_point(size = 2, colour = 'salmon') +
  theme_graph()
```
